description: An observed economic flow, which could reflect creation or a change in the quantity, location, accountability and/or responsibility, of an economic resource.

action.description: Defines the kind of flow, such as consume, produce, work, transfer, etc. Reference to a vf.knowledge.action label.

provider.description: The economic agent who initiated the event.

receiver.description: The economic agent for whom the event is performed.

resourceInventoriedAs.description: Reference to the vf.observation.economicResource involved in the flow.

toResourceInventoriedAs.description: Additional economic resource on the event when needed by the receiver (used for transfers/moves).

resourceClassifiedAs.description: Classification URIs or tags for the resource.

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource counted or inventoried.

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the work or use or citation effort-based action.

hasPointInTime.description: The actual date/time of the event.

hasBeginning.description: The actual beginning date/time of the event.

hasEnd.description: The actual ending date/time of the event.

inputOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.process this event is an input of.

outputOf.description: Reference to a vf.planning.process this event is an output of.

realizationOf.description: Reference to a vf.agreement.agreement this event realizes.

reciprocalRealizationOf.description: Reference to a vf.agreement.agreement this reciprocal event realizes.

corrects.description: Reference to a vf.observation.economicEvent that this event corrects.

toLocation.description: Reference to a vf.geo.spatialThing for the new location of the receiver resource.

fulfills.description: References to vf.planning.commitment records fulfilled completely or partially by this event.

satisfies.description: References to vf.planning.intent records satisfied fully or partially by this event.

settles.description: References to vf.planning.claim records settled fully or partially by this event.

state.description: The state of the resource after this event.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the event.

image.description: URI to an image relevant to the event.

created.description: The date/time the event was recorded.
